CustomField.description: It is mandatory to send email confirmation to your end customer with the generated Boleto URL/PIX code once an order is placed. Emails should always include the Boleto URL/PIX code. This procedure is extremely important to increase your payment conversions. PagBrasil offers both services with customizable features on behalf of your company. The order confirmation email/SMS is sent when a Boleto/PIX is generated, and the reminder email/SMS is sent two days before the Boleto’s/PIX’s expiration date. Notifications should be sent at two different moments: a) Order confirmation: when the order is created, and the Boleto/PIX is generated b) Due date reminder: 1 or 2 days before the Boleto/PIX due date.
